decisions.description: This test is to make sure there is a master record. It only needs to create one once after the package is installed.
decisions.name: Found_Record
decisions.label: Found Record?

formulas.name: fConfirmFlowDescription
formulas.expression: IF( AND( {!vFlowHasDesciption}, {!Update_Add_Flow_Description} <> {!vFlowDescription} ), "• Changed the Flow Description" & {!fCRLF}, IF( AND( NOT( {!vFlowHasDesciption} ), NOT( ISBLANK( {!Update_Add_Flow_Description} ) ) ), "• Added a Flow Description" & {!fCRLF}, "" ) )

formulas.name: fConfirmOrphanRemoval
formulas.expression: IF( {!Orphan_dt.numberOfRowsSelected} > 0, "• Selected " & TEXT( {!Orphan_dt.numberOfRowsSelected} ) & " Orphaned Resources for Removal" & {!fCRLF}, "" )

formulas.name: fElementTypeHeader
formulas.expression: CASE( {!ElementBasic_dt.outputSelectedRow.Resource_Type__c}, "start", "Start", "actionCalls", "Action", "assignments", "Assignment", "collectionProcessors", "Collection (Sort, Filter, etc)", "recordCreates", "Create Records", "recordLookups", "Get Records", "recordUpdates", "Update Records", "recordDeletes", "Delete Records", "recordRollbacks", "Roll Back Records", "subflows", "Subflow", "waits", "Pause", "screens", "Screen", "loops", "Loop", "decisions", "Decision", "Other Element - " & {!ElementBasic_dt.outputSelectedRow.Resource_Type__c} )

subflows.name: Add_Component_Highlights_to_Flow_Metadata
subflows.label: Add Component Highlights to Flow Metadata

textTemplates.name: ttPassDML
textTemplates.text: ✅ Did not identify any potential DML elements inside of a loop.

textTemplates.name: ttPassHardcoded
textTemplates.text: ✅ Did not identify any potential hard-coded ids.

textTemplates.name: ttPassOrphan
textTemplates.text: ✅ Did not find any orphan variables or other resources.

textTemplates.name: ttWarnDML
textTemplates.text:
⚠️ Found {!vCountDML} possible occurrences of DML elements inside of a loop.

To avoid hitting governor limits, you should try to avoid putting DML (Read/Write/Update/Delete) elements inside of a loop. Instead add individual records to a record collection variable, inside of the loop, and use that variable in a DML element after the loop.

textTemplates.name: ttWarnHardcoded
textTemplates.text:
⚠️ Found {!vCountHardcoded} possible hard-coded ids.

Avoid hard-coded ids in flows as the values could change when deploying your flow to another Sandbox or to Production. Instead, use a Get Records to find Record Type, User or Group ids or store the values in Custom Labels, Permissions or Metadata Types.

textTemplates.name: ttWarnOrphan
textTemplates.text:
⚠️ Found {!vCountOrphans} orphan resources.

These are not referenced elsewhere in the flow and can be removed.
